text: Ricky Martin Net Worth : Ricky Martin is a Puerto Rican pop musician, actor and author who has a net worth of $ 60 million dollars. Born Enrique Mart√≠n Morales on December 24, 1971, in San Juan, Puerto Rico, the musically gifted Martin made his start with the all - boy pop group Menudo in 1984. After five years with the band, he embarked on a solo career with the release of his 1991 Spanish - language studio album, Ricky Martin. He went on to release few more albums in Spanish, after which finally came to light his first English - language album ( also titled Ricky Martin ).
